name: Andor Polgar
introduction: I built my first website when I was 12 years old. I figured out HTML by experimenting and changing the source code of other websites on the internet. My first big thing was to take over the maintenance of my school's website when I was 14 years old. As a kid, I always wanted to be an embedded system developer, but to pay my tutiton and my living costs in Budapest, I had to start building websites for money. - That's how I ended up in the industry.
mostImportantThings: I have 7 years of professional experience working as a web developer
More than 4 years of experience working with a high availability system
I had been trusted with deployment rights on a multi-billion dollar streaming platform
I have 4 years of experience in optimizing websites for low-end devices
I interviewed more than 50 developers for senior and medior positions
I have more than 10 years of experience programming in JavaScript
Worked in 4 countries in multicultural environments: Hungary, Luxembourg, United States, Netherlands

positions.description: I joined Docler in 2013 as a TV & Mobile Frontend Developer in Budapest. Since that time, I have worked in the Luxembourg, Los Angeles and now Amsterdam offices in progressively higher roles. I'm currently helping to establish a development team here in the Amsterdam branch, interviewing senior front-end developers, mentoring newcomers and looking for potential team members who are willing to help us with rebuilding the mobile web application of LiveJasmin.
I was helping to establish a strong front-end team in the overseas branch of the company.
After the company relocated me to Luxembourg, I took a key role in rebuilding the mobile web application for LiveJasmin, which is the company's flagship product.
I was assigned to maintain the mobile web application of LiveJasmin, which is the company's flagship product.

I advertised myself as freelance web developer to pay my tuition fees. I worked with hungarian companies mostly, I built smaller websites, landing pages for advertising campaigns, Drupal and Wordpress blog themes.
